name: TapRPG - Homeland
description: TapRPG - Homeland is the first in the TapRPG series showcasing a unique style of RPG gaming. The classic top-down overworld map leading into 2D side-scrolling hack and slash. Your hero automatically runs across the levels, but defeating the enemies is no easy task.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Equivalent CPU Memory: 64 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Equivalent CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
